ingredients.item: 2 medjool dates, pitted and roughly chopped
Â½ x 500g pot Yeo Valley Natural Organic Yogurt

instructions.step: Put the bananas, frozen berries, dates, mint and yogurt in a small high-speed blender. Whizz until completely smooth (you may need to stop it and scrape down the sides halfway through).
Divide the smoothie between 2 bowls and top with the fresh berries and spelt flakes. Serve immediately.
